content.user_title: Create professional slide decks from content
content.value_statement: Users struggle to transform written content into visual presentations. This skill analyzes content, generates comprehensive slide outlines with style specifications, and produces individual slide images using AI image generation.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes input content to automatically select appropriate visual style
Generates detailed slide outlines with narrative goals and layout specifications
Creates 9 distinct visual styles: corporate, technical, playful, minimal, storytelling, warm, retro-flat, editorial, and notion
Produces individual slide images as PNG files
Supports multiple audiences: beginners, intermediate, experts, executives, and general
Limits output to 20 slides per deck with sequential image generation
limitations: No live presentation format - outputs standalone slide images for reading and sharing
Depends on baoyu-gemini-web skill for actual image generation
Image generation typically takes 10-30 seconds per slide

best_practices: Provide complete source content with key data points for accurate slide generation
Specify audience level to optimize detail density and explanation depth
Use style presets or let auto-detection choose based on content signals
anti_patterns: Requesting more than 20 slides degrades quality and increases generation time
Using vague prompts without content source reduces accuracy
Skipping the outline step misses opportunity to review and customize structure

faq.question: What file formats does it accept?
faq.answer: Markdown files with content, or direct text input via the skill interface.

faq.question: How long does image generation take?
faq.answer: Typically 10-30 seconds per slide, depending on complexity and style.

faq.question: Can I edit the generated outline?
faq.answer: Yes, the outline is saved first and can be modified before image generation.

faq.question: What image resolution are the slides?
faq.answer: Slides are generated as 16:9 landscape images suitable for digital viewing.

faq.question: Does it support custom fonts?
faq.answer: Style presets define fonts; custom fonts would require modifying style templates.

faq.question: Can I regenerate a single slide?
faq.answer: Yes, individual prompt files exist for each slide and can be re-run.
